Projects

  • Genstall » Automated Gentoo Linux installer for bare metal or Vagrant.

  • Gentoo Vagrant » Gentoo Linux boxes for use with Vagrant (VBox & AWS).

  • Gentoo AWS » Gentoo Linux AMIs for use with AWS.

  • Binhost-Utils » Utility for building and maintaining a binary package server for Gentoo Linux.
